Author: luplum
Text: Thank you ;-;  I've been chugging water like crazy now so I can try again on Monday and see if it was a dehydration thing.  I've never actually owned a scale before during my previous relapses, so I thought "starving but gaining" was a myth...

Author: tinyTRONgirl
Text: That’s such a small amount! Don’t sweat it. I know that horribly defeated feeling when you step on the scale expecting it to show a smaller number than before and it doesn’t. But that is a very normal amount of water weight to be holding for any number of reasons. Hormones, lack of sleep, extra caffeine, high sodium, anything. Don’t beat yourself up ♥️
